locate_harmonic_controls.title: The Control Chamber
locate_harmonic_controls.description: Following power conduits through the crystal caves, you discover a hidden chamber filled with monitoring equipment and control panels. Banks of screens show real-time harmonic disruption patterns across the entire Depths network. This isn't random sabotage - it's a coordinated control system designed to destabilize the archipelago's navigation.

choices.text: 'I need to document this evidence before doing anything else.'
'Can I shut down this control system?'
'I should trace who has access to this chamber.'
'This connects to the other crisis situations - I need to report back.'

locate_sabotage_source.title: The Source Revealed
locate_sabotage_source.description: Following the electromagnetic signatures leads you to an abandoned maintenance facility on the archipelago's edge. Inside, you discover a sophisticated operation - banks of transmission equipment, detailed maps of infrastructure networks, and communication logs that reveal the scope of the conspiracy. This isn't just sabotage - it's the nerve center of a coordinated attack on the entire archipelago.

choices.text: 'I need to document everything before they discover I'm here.'
'I should try to capture whoever's running this operation.'
'This evidence needs to get to all crisis response teams immediately.'
